name: vscode-taskexplorer
description: Tasks management for npm, vscode, yarn, ant, gradle, grunt, gulp, batch, bash,php composer, make, maven, python, perl, powershell, ruby, pipenv, nsis.  Supports external task providers via API.

scripts.test-all: npm run clean && npm run rebuild_test && node ./dist/test/runTest.js
scripts.test-ant: npm run clean && npm run rebuild_test && node ./dist/test/runTest.js _api ant xDeactivate
scripts.test-api: npm run clean && npm run rebuild_test && node ./dist/test/runTest.js api xDeactivate
scripts.test-composer: npm run clean && npm run rebuild_test && node ./dist/test/runTest.js composer xDeactivate
scripts.test-configuration: npm run clean && npm run rebuild_test && node ./dist/test/runTest.js configuration xDeactivate
scripts.test-gulp: npm run clean && npm run rebuild_test && node ./dist/test/runTest.js gulp xDeactivate
scripts.test-infopage: npm run clean && npm run rebuild_test && node ./dist/test/runTest.js infoPage xDeactivate
scripts.test-licensemgr: npm run clean && npm run rebuild_test && node ./dist/test/runTest.js licenseManager xDeactivate
scripts.test-makefile: npm run clean && npm run rebuild_test && node ./dist/test/runTest.js makefile xDeactivate
scripts.test-npm: npm run clean && npm run rebuild_test && node ./dist/test/runTest.js npm xDeactivate
scripts.test-providers: npm run clean && npm run rebuild_test && node ./dist/test/runTest.js providers xDeactivate
scripts.test-python: npm run clean && npm run rebuild_test && node ./dist/test/runTest.js python xDeactivate
scripts.test-tasks: npm run clean && npm run rebuild_test && node ./dist/test/runTest.js tasks xDeactivate
scripts.test-tree: npm run clean && npm run rebuild_test && node ./dist/test/runTest.js tree xDeactivate
scripts.test-workspace: npm run clean && npm run rebuild_test && node ./dist/test/runTest.js workspace xDeactivate
scripts.test-util: npm run clean && npm run rebuild_test && node ./dist/test/runTest.js util xDeactivate
scripts.test:before: npm run rebuild_test && npm run coverage-full_on

view/item/context.when: config.taskExplorer.enableExplorerView && config.taskExplorer.showFavoritesButton && view == taskExplorer && viewItem == script
config.taskExplorer.enableExplorerView && config.taskExplorer.showFavoritesButton && view == taskExplorer && viewItem == scriptFile
config.taskExplorer.enableExplorerView && config.taskExplorer.showFavoritesButton && view == taskExplorer && viewItem == scriptRunning
config.taskExplorer.enableExplorerView && config.taskExplorer.showFavoritesButton && view == taskExplorer && viewItem == scriptS
config.taskExplorer.enableExplorerView && config.taskExplorer.showFavoritesButton && view == taskExplorer && viewItem == scriptFileS
config.taskExplorer.enableExplorerView && config.taskExplorer.showFavoritesButton && view == taskExplorer && viewItem == scriptRunningS
config.taskExplorer.enableSideBar && config.taskExplorer.showFavoritesButton && view == taskExplorerSideBar && viewItem == script
config.taskExplorer.enableSideBar && config.taskExplorer.showFavoritesButton && view == taskExplorerSideBar && viewItem == scriptFile
config.taskExplorer.enableSideBar && config.taskExplorer.showFavoritesButton && view == taskExplorerSideBar && viewItem == scriptRunning
config.taskExplorer.enableSideBar && config.taskExplorer.showFavoritesButton && view == taskExplorerSideBar && viewItem == scriptS
config.taskExplorer.enableSideBar && config.taskExplorer.showFavoritesButton && view == taskExplorerSideBar && viewItem == scriptFileS
config.taskExplorer.enableSideBar && config.taskExplorer.showFavoritesButton && view == taskExplorerSideBar && viewItem == scriptRunningS
